slides.title: Fractions Basics
slides.content:
**Fraction:** Part of whole (numerator/denominator)
**Types:** Proper (½), Improper (5/4), Mixed (1¼)
**Operations:** Same denominator - add/subtract numerators
**Conversion:** 1/2 = 0.5 = 50%

slides.title: Decimals
slides.content:
**Place Value:** Ones.Tenths Hundredths Thousandths
**Conversions:** Fraction to decimal (divide), Decimal to percentage (×100)
**Operations:** Add/subtract (align decimal points), Multiply/divide normally
